title: Sweet 20 (2015)

cast.name: Thanh Nam Nghe Si Uu Tu

overview: Mrs. Dai, a 70-year old grandmother, suddenly finds that she has been transformed into her 20-year old self. Her old fashioned sense of style and manners cause some trouble, but falling in love could be the biggest problem of them all.
storyline: Mrs. Dai, a 70-year old grandmother, suddenly finds that she has been transformed into her 20-year old self. Her old fashioned sense of style and manners cause some trouble, but falling in love could be the biggest problem of them all.
synopsis: Mrs. Dai, a foul-mouthed granny in her seventies is reverted to a twenty-year old maiden, Thanh Nga and given the opportunity to enjoy her youth, dream and passion which she had to sacrifice for her family when she was young. One da, Thanh Nga, a preety girl with a beautiful voice and impressive characteristics appears and stirs up the peaceful lives of three men: the rebellious rock singer Tri Tung, the music producer Manh Duc, and the 70 year old neighbor Mr. Be. All of them fall in love with Thanh Nga and try to pursuit her - the cute but sassy & weird girl that no one really knows who she is. What will happen whit this complicated love adventure? Will this priceless miracle last forever?
